to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise

sentences.english: Their secret engagement was finally revealed. I always say murder will out.
sentences.chinese: 他們的密約終於被揭露了，我常說紙是包不住火的。

sentences.english: The Japanese Government had a secret deal with Germany during the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 第二次世界大戰時，日本政府和德國訂有密約。

sentences.english: Japan seeks to come clean from secret nuke deal.
sentences.chinese: 日本政府力求搞清對美載核航母停靠日本港口密約。

definition: border fort, esp. defending narrow valley

lit. a white cloud transforms into what looks like a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
